snippet.title: MOMOHorrorStory2Madhouse
snippet.description:
Help Poison Games work more efficiently, check this link https://gogetfunding.com/one-cup-of-coffee-so-i-can-work-more-easily/
Thanks.

Android Download: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PoisonGames.MBHS2
PC Download: https://gamejolt.com/games/momo2/529491

After you escaped from Slender-man in your house, you lost your sanity. The asylum is you home now.
But did you really get away from Him ? Is It real or it's just in your head ?
You are about to find out in this thrilling horror adventure.
Solve the puzzles and fight scary mental patients while you trying to leave the madhouse.

Features:
Great looking graphics and easy to understand controls.
Creepy looking enemies.
Four weapons: frying pan, hammer, glock 17 gun and grenades.
Realistic Asylum location.
